content: inspired by grumpy cat and kawaii toy trends snuggle up to this endearing crochet toy that kids will love stitching in bernat baby velvet and bernat crushed velvet this irresistibly soft and cushy toy is stitched almost entirely in the round using single_crochet a tight crochet ensures a nice dense fabric that won t let the stuffing show through practice single_crochet simple shaping and even embroidery to complete this project pattern offers 2 colorways to inspire but you can create any personality for your fat little feline also needed * stuffing 2 stitch markers * small amount of bernat baby velvet in potpourri 86029 and yolk yellow 86041 for eyes and nose * small amount of black worsted weight yarn for eyes and mouth
